  14. (**************************************************************************)

  16. (** Boolean values.

  18.     @since 4.08 *)

  20. (** {1:bools Booleans} *)

  22. ‌type t = bool = false | true (**)
  23. (** The type of booleans (truth values).

  25.     The constructors [false] and [true] are included here so that they have
  26.     paths, but they are not intended to be used in user-defined data types.
  27. *)

  29. val not : bool -> bool
  30. (** [not b] is the boolean negation of [b]. *)

  32. external ( && ) : bool -> bool -> bool = "%sequand"
  33. (** [e0 && e1] is the lazy boolean conjunction of expressions [e0] and [e1].
  34.     If [e0] evaluates to [false], [e1] is not evaluated. Right-associative
  35.     operator at precedence level 3/11. *)

  37. external ( || ) : bool -> bool -> bool = "%sequor"
  38. (** [e0 || e1] is the lazy boolean disjunction of expressions [e0] and [e1].
  39.     If [e0] evaluates to [true], [e1] is not evaluated. Right-associative
  40.     operator at precedence level 2/11. *)

  42. (** {1:preds Predicates and comparisons} *)

  44. ‌val equal : bool -> bool -> bool
  45. (** [equal b0 b1] is [true] if and only if [b0] and [b1] are both [true]
  46.     or both [false]. *)

  48. ‌val compare : bool -> bool -> int
  49. (** [compare b0 b1] is a total order on boolean values. [false] is smaller
  50.     than [true]. *)

  52. (** {1:convert Converting} *)

  54. ‌val to_int : bool -> int
  55. (** [to_int b] is [0] if [b] is [false] and [1] if [b] is [true]. *)

  57. ‌val to_float : bool -> float
  58. (** [to_float b] is [0.] if [b] is [false] and [1.] if [b] is [true]. *)

  60. (*
  61. val of_string : string -> bool option
  62. (** [of_string s] is [Some true] if [s] is ["true"], [Some false] if [s]
  63.     is ["false"] and [None] otherwise. *)
  64. *)

  66. ‌val to_string : bool -> string
  67. (** [to_string b] is ["true"] if [b] is [true] and ["false"] if [b] is
  68.     [false]. *)

  70. ‌val seeded_hash : int -> bool -> int
  71. (** A seeded hash function for booleans, with the same output value as
  72.     {!Hashtbl.seeded_hash}. This function allows this module to be passed as
  73.     argument to the functor {!Hashtbl.MakeSeeded}.

  75.     @since 5.1 *)

  77. ‌val hash : bool -> int
  78. (** An unseeded hash function for booleans, with the same output value as
  79.     {!Hashtbl.hash}. This function allows this module to be passed as argument
  80.     to the functor {!Hashtbl.Make}.

  82.     @since 5.1 *)
